storyInfo: Loken invites Rosmontis and snubs Muelsyse. Faced with an unconscious Saria, Silence wavers. In a luxurious hall, Jara stays silent.

attributes.content: You wrote the letter? You wanted me to come here?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes, my child. I even wanted to go looking for you myself.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: But time is short, so I had no choice but to have a friend deliver that letter to... Rhodes Island. Yes, Rhodes Island, that's what it was.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: And after the disaster... I heard that organization took you in. Have they been treating you well?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: They are... my family.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, Amiya, the Doctor, Blaze, Raidian... and everyone in the squad, they're all my family.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: So you mean... you've found a new family...*cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The frail man coughs violently, and his naturally crooked body seems to droop even lower.
He stares at Rosmontis, as if wanting to go move to her, but a thin wall of water stops him in his tracks.
Muelsyse knows who he is, and so do you. This is the very same name that cropped up many times in Rosmontis's files.
The criminal that should have been well behind bars has suddenly appeared before you, acting as a grandparent rushing to visit his grandchild after work.

attributes.options: You came alone?;You came here alone... to find Rosmontis?

attributes.content: This is what I wanted. Nothing to do with anyone else.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Let me... let me get a good look at you...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You've grown up, girl.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Over the past four years... no, it should be five soon enough...? I've thought of you so many times while we've been apart.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Whenever I think about the time we were separated from each other, I just feel so... sorry.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I'm sorry... that I couldn't protect you from them. Those mediocre hacks with their superficial goals... they destroyed the future we could have had together.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: A future? Were we supposed to live together?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I don't remember you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Um... should I have remembered this? I record everything I don't want to forget in my terminal.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You've forgotten who I am? Have you lost all your memories, and forgotten the wrongs I've done?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Are you a bad man? Did you do something bad to me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's not for me to answer, my child. It would make this meeting meaningless.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Your memory loss... it should not have been an effect of the experiments. Could there have been another party? Maylander, or perhaps Rhine?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Don't aim those eyes my way, Mr. Williams. I'm just the teensy weensy Director of Ecological.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Besides, even if the old goat was here, his precarious code of ethics wouldn't be any worse than yours, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with ethics.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, did you wipe the girl's memories and manipulate her emotions?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.options: I won't dignify that with a response.;It's not something Rhodes Island would do.

attributes.content: Yes, you couldn't have done that. It was my work after all... I was so meticulous that no one could have possibly stripped away such an important part of her when her vitals were functioning normally.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Oh, I see now... it was me after all? Perhaps I didn't make enough observations... Yes... We didn't have the luxury of time... The pressure of consciousness is honestly beyond anything a layman could comprehend...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Or could it be... that you passed your memories onto your sibling?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I... don't know how to answer you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There must be a way, let me think...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Any fragment of that incident is beyond meaningless, same as the records and data, they all belong in the garbage dump. But emotions, shapes, scents... oh yes, smells, that's it.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: A... floral scent?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This smells like... crushed juice... smeared on the walls, and on my hands...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No... no...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Stop, stop thinking about it! I don't want this!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes, I knew it! I'm still somewhere in your memories!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Please, child, bring out those memories, remember your hatred for me, let your anger fill your body, your mind, your omnipresent spirit!
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Get out of here.;You're hurting Rosmontis.

attributes.content: Hurting her?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: No, her pain comes from the past, not the present. I only want to give her the gift she's been longing for.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.options: This is not a gift.;This is torture.

attributes.content: Do you actually understand her pain?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Everything you know about her and her experiences is second-hand information from Maylander. Don't you think she has the right to be angry, to hold resentment?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Oh, I know. Haha, both you and Maylander are walking the same path. You want her easy to control, because you're afraid of her, afraid of...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: ...A weapon of reignited anger.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: 'Weapon.'
Everything you experienced with Rosmontis in Chernobog comes flooding back before your eyes. The fights desperate with determination to live alongside the pain of farewells.
Yes, you've heard the term used many a time in the past to describe the Feline girl by your side. She felt it was harsh before, but this time it's unbearable.
Because it came out of Loken Williams's mouth, the root cause that led Rosmontis here in the first place.
You have many ideas on how to refute his claims. It also occurs to you that if Kal'tsit were here, she would be capable of coming up with an even more extensive response.
But another thought comes to mind before your words.
Gah...*cough*...haha...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I see you're outraged by my words, that's fine. You're not willing to think of her as a 'weapon.' But, just look at her... She's standing in front of you, even wielding a sword for you.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Gah...*cough*...haha...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I see you're outraged by my words, that's fine. You're not willing to think of her as a 'weapon.' But, just look at her... She's standing in front of you, even wielding a sword for you.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Doctor, please get behind me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: My sword might be about to pierce through the building's outer wall.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Enemies.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There are enemies closing in quickly.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I will protect you, Doctor. My mind still feels like... it's a mess. up. But Dr. Kal'tsit and Amiya told me my mental state is a lot more stable now. They allowed me to protect you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And this is one thing I can definitely do.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor... of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: If you truly care for her, then you should know what she really needs.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Just ask yourself this... what are you trying to protect? A soldier that would die for you, or a child with a traumatic past?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The question is not difficult to answer, but it is obvious that Loken is not interested in your reply.
From the moment he stepped into the room, he has been staring directly at the white Feline girl next to you, his turbid gaze full of enthusiasm, sorrow, and a certain kind of anticipation.
They're here!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Such a pity that this is the end of our meeting.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You're not ready yet, my child... but I know you will be.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I'll be waiting for you at 'home.'
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Hold it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You actually caught up... no, you were waiting for me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Which one of you is your true self? The silent one in the room earlier, or the one right here?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: That's not important.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your Originium Arts are quite interesting, or perhaps... no, forget it, I don't have time for this curiosity.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Do you have business with me, Director of Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Where's Kristen?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ah...... but you're the Rhine one here. Are you sure you should be asking me that?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: The only way you could have gotten out of prison is with her help.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your being here means the work she entrusted to you is already complete.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She's done preparing, right? She's really planning to...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Pitiful girl.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm not about to let a rotten geezer who looks like he hasn't showered in three days call me pitiful.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Astonished, unwilling, and anxious... you're afraid, little girl. You're afraid of being betrayed by those you trust, and of being abandoned by others.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Well, the worst is your confusion... You're at such a complete loss that you have no choice but to ask an 'outsider' like me.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Such a familiar feeling it is...*cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: When my teacher handed all my research to Maylander, when he expelled me from the academy...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: When my students submitted all my data to the military before I did, and I had to speed up my experiments, leading to that ultimate failure...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: When my family sold everything we had in D.C. and disappeared...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: I saw that very same look in the mirror.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: ...My eye bags can't be that bad?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I just don't get it... why would she trust that wretched woman from Maylander and you over Saria, or... ugh....
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Are you stalling for time here? If you're waiting for Ho'olheyak to pick you up, I won't necessarily lose, you know?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You don't want me for an enemy, girl.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Do you really think you could stop Kristen and I just by catching up to me?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Or, maybe...
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You want to catch me, to catch... Kristen?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Muelsyse falls into a daze. Loken turns his back and yet she still doesn't act.
Only when the familiar wind caresses her face so mockingly does she realize that Loken is no longer anywhere to be seen on the streets.
I let him go... what am I doing...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm... I'm right here, heard everything you said crystal clear, yessiree.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Did your clone manage to stop Loken?;Is your clone in danger?

attributes.content: Clone...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My... *ahem* Yes, my clone outside.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, you guessed right. They couldn't have let such a terminally ill old man come here by himself.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Before his assistants got him away, I only managed to get one thing—Loken Williams is definitely involved in Kristen's plans.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: The 'home' that Loken spoke of...;The secret that Maylander and the army are scrambling for.
And they're pointing right at Kristen Wright's hideout.

attributes.content: Doctor, your terminal... there's a new message?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: It's from Maylander.;Maylander has some new information to share with us.

attributes.content: What a coinkydink, I was just wondering when we were gonna see the Tin Man again.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You got roughed up by the army because of him, so it's only right that he should make it up to you, isn't it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Rosmontis, are you ready to proceed with the mission?

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Thanks for standing with us.;Thank you for helping Rosmontis.

attributes.content: Ah... haha... our cooperation is far from over, so you're going to wear out those words if keep standing on ceremony, you know?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor... do you really trust me so much?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Nothing. Alright, let's get moving.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Silence, is the temperature okay... not too hot?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You're controlling it very well.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria's body temperature has stabilized, and she should be out of danger.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit, you should rest for a bit. Using Originium Arts for a long time will wear you out.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, I'm staying with Saria.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I still remember back in the white room... she kept me company when I was stuck in that bed.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I was always in pain, my mind was totally messed up, and I couldn't stop myself from burning everything I saw.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I don't even have a clear picture of every visit, I just know that every time I opened my eyes, she would there at my bedside, and I felt so relieved.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So now I want to stay here and keep her company. Even though she won't open her eyes... I'm sure she can feel that I'm here.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...I'm sure she can.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She just needs... a bit more sleep.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Something still feels off.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I just realized Saria isn't that much taller than I am. And also... her palms are soft, with such pretty nails too. Just like your hands, Silence.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria is... of course, an ordinary human.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm afraid she's quite far from 'ordinary.'
Director Jara...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She prefers to solve problems by herself, without a word. She always keeps a straight face that deters people from voicing their opinions.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Would you like to make a guess just how many employees from Defense I had to offer psychological counseling year after year?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Are you... unhappy with Saria?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Unhappy? Hmph.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: One year I asked Kristen if she was set on transferring a researcher to make the head of the Defense Section—Guess what the woman there did when she found out?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: She threw three dozen listening devices onto my desk, and right in my face, shattered them to pieces with her newly developed Arts.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: An unfortunate thing, as a couple of them were operating on behalf of some of our dear government departments.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: They were just a little wary of such a rapidly-progressing tech company.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I was happy to share some 'controllable' information with them, to get them to ease up a little.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I spent some time dealing with the trouble that came with the incident... but who could deny the determination and skill of that young Vouivre?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I guess... Saria has always been like that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sure enough, many years have come and gone, and if you compare her then and now, it doesn't seem like there's been much development.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: She's the most resolute and determined woman I know.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Who ever said she wasn't? I've watched she and Kristen walk their paths, and I'm well aware just how decisive and strong she is.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But even such an outstanding individual can't stand against... the whole damned country. If you let her take on these obstacles she hasn't overcome in all this time, she'll only be smashed to bits.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Car keys...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Take Saria and Ifrit and leave, before it's too late.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Saria... wouldn't want that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, she wouldn't. But I'm not talking to Saria right now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Aren't you the type to go 'innocent lives shouldn't be put at risk?' This girl shouldn't be involved, and neither should you. No one needs to die here.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I need... a bit more time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm afraid we're all out of time. Take the secret passageway out, now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: An old friend has come knocking.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: This conference room...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Whenever we had meetings, Parvis would sit by the window, Muelsyse likes to sit in the middle, and you... Director Jara, you sit here, furthest from Kristen.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And you're the same as before, always standing behind somebody else's seat.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Hm... how nostalgic.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Would you like something to drink? Red wine, or should we pop open the champagne?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Is there an occasion?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Of course. Mr. Ferdinand Clooney is enjoying a career upgrade, and also returned to Rhine Lab... Sounds like a cause for celebration?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You think I'm here as the army's guide?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: No, they have their own plans for Rhine, and I don't approve at all. Because I know that if something happens to the Vice President while he's here, that's the end of the company.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Kristen can ignore the existence of Rhine Lab, but not me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The event today went off without a hitch.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Don't play dumb with me, Jara.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You may not know just what kind of people run the army. They could repeat today's adventure anytime they want.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: So before those savages rip a dozen years' worth of time and effort to shreds, can you just tell me the truth—what exactly is Kristen doing?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Did Colonel Blake not tell you?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The very first day Dr. Wright disappeared, I handed every document about Control and her projects right over to them.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And for the record, it happened more than once. I worked days of overtime just for this.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Heh, 'Dr. Wright,' as if you two have the most ordinary collaborative relationship.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Should I show Blake the picture hidden in the darkest corner of your office drawer?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Or has our dear HR Director already come up with an explanation for why she's hidden the New Year's card little Kristen wrote her two decades ago?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: ...That's just an old photo.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Kids aren't as cute and well-behaved after they grow up. Ferdinand, you know that better than me. That sock in the jaw at Site 359 still smarting?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: She's gone into hiding, like a child clinging to her favorite toy. Except it's not a toy, it's a goddamned superweapon, with some real forbidden secrets behind it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: So you should find and drag her out, if you still care about her.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Or would you rather watch her die for the vaguest of ideals?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Even if... I couldn't bear to watch her go that far ahead, how do you suppose that stopping her is within my power?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: This is Kristen we're talking about, Ferdinand. She'll take everything you have.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Do you think she would ever leave such a major weakness—if you really want to treat the relationship between me and her as a vulnerability—so easily within your grasp?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Good... great. You refuse to cooperate.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And what about the others? For example...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Saria.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You rescued her, and you've hidden her somewhere around here.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You're so willing to talk to me, just to buy her more time to escape.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Let's say she manages to escape. Who could she even go to?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, caught up in the same mess, or that group of Maylander agents who love spinning webs just as much as you do?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: ...I have no idea what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The military just picked up a new piece of intelligence.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Saria... as well as the company behind her, Rhodes Island, are suspected of helping Kristen steal classified information pertaining to national security.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Maybe working at Rhine Lab for more than a decade has made you naive enough to... assume your old boss was some hero of justice?
attributes.name: Ferdinand
